Header.title: Welcome to HighonBugs Newsletter
Header.paragraph: The Community Writes. The Community Reads. The Community Grows.

About.paragraph: Hello guys, I'm SBK and I enjoy creating, whatever it may be. I started my Dev journey in late 2020 and early 2021 and have been absolutely stoked with it at the time. I freelance for Web Development and am looking for opportunities in Machine Learning and Data Science. I have a passion for learning whatever new technology I lay my eyes on.

Features.text: We let the community write and request what they need.
